post.description: This endpoint allows the user to log in by providing email and password
post.summary: Logs in a User and returns user data

200.description: Successfully logged in and returned user data

post.description: This endpoint refreshes an access token using a refresh token
This endpoint allows you to register a new User by providing required fields

409.description: Email or nickname already in use

get.description: Returns a user's shopping cart and its items

post.description: Adds a game to a user's shopping cart

delete.description: Clears all items from a user's shopping cart
Removes a game from a user's shopping cart

Returns a list of all game developers
Returns the list of games favorited by the user

delete.description: Removes all games from a user's favorites list

get.description: Returns a paginated list of games

post.description: Creates a new game with the provided details

get.description: Returns games belonging to a specific category

200.description: List of games in the category

get.description: Returns a list of games with discounts

200.description: List of games matching the search criteria

get.description: Returns a list of top selling games
Returns a game by its ID

delete.description: Deletes a game by its ID

patch.description: Updates a game with the provided details

get.description: Returns the list of games owned by the user

200.description: List of games in the user's library

Returns an order by its ID

Creates a new review for a game
